subject: The young athlete
sentence: The young athlete respected her coach.
paragraph: The young athlete always listened to her coach’s advice. The coach had a reputation for being a skilled strategist. The young athlete respected her coach. Over the years, the athlete achieved great success. She attributed much of her success to her coach.

paragraph: John relocated for a new job opportunity. It was his first time living so far away. John misses his family after moving to a new city. He called them every weekend. His bond with them remained strong despite the distance.

subject: Students

subject: The community

subject: Many

subject: Children
